fields.description: The ISO Country Code of the location of this activity.
fields.title: Country Code
fields.name: countryCode

fields.description: The latitude of a point location
fields.title: Latitude
fields.name: latitude

fields.description: The longitude of a point location
fields.title: Longitude
fields.name: longitude

fields.description: A description of this location. This could include details of the element of the activity that takes place here.
fields.title: Description
fields.name: description

fields.description: A code referring to a geographical area, drawn from an established gazetteer. For example, the code for a local authority ward, or parliamentary constituency.
fields.title: Geographic Code
fields.name: geoCode

fields.description: The type of Geographic Code (geoCode) used (e.g. Ward, Parliamentary Constituency etc.). This value for this field should be drawn from the [codelist of geographic code types](https://github.com/ThreeSixtyGiving/standard/tree/master/codelists/geoCodeType.csv).
fields.title: Geographic Code Type
fields.name: geoCodeType

fields.description: The date when location information was last modified.
fields.title: Last modified
fields.name: dateModified
